# Github Copilot App Modernization Docs

> Documentation for Github Copilot App Modernization Docs.

*Topics available: 3*

- [Apply custom upgrade instructions for .NET upgrades](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/porting/github-copilot-app-modernization/how-to-custom-upgrade-instructions.md): Create and apply custom upgrade instructions with GitHub Copilot to automate .NET upgrades. Learn to write, test, and integrate instructions for consistent transformations.
- [How to upgrade a .NET app with GitHub Copilot app modernization](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/porting/github-copilot-app-modernization/how-to-upgrade-with-github-copilot.md): Learn how to upgrade your .NET applications to newer versions using GitHub Copilot app modernization in Visual Studio. This step-by-step guide covers the three-stage workflow: assessment, planning, and execution.
- [GitHub Copilot app modernization overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/porting/github-copilot-app-modernization/overview.md): Learn more about GitHub Copilot app modernization. This Visual Studio extension helps you upgrade your code and projects. Upgrades can include .NET versioning or migrating code from one technology to another.
